room_title: Escape room "Vegas" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: We took my cousin here for her 40th birthday and we all had a blast. We were a group of 9 and managed to escape this fun room. Definitely try the Vegas room!

room_title: Escape room "Vegas" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: My family and I had a blast at the Amazing Escape Vegas-themed room. It was our first escape room and I wanted it to be a successful experience, so I chose the Vegas room since folks have the best success rate at it (according to the website). The hints we received while in the room helped make it the success I hoped for. It came down to the wire - 1 second left - and when the door opened we all erupted into a celebration yell and high fives all around. Wonderful experience. Two of our group were initially concerned about feeling trapped in the room, but they didn't have any problem.

room_title: Escape room "Vegas" by Amazing Escape in Atlanta
review: We had a blast!! The staff is very friendly and make the experience that much better! I highly recommend Rush Escape Rooms!!
